items.badge_description: Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 5 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different sour beers. A sour beer on Untappd is any beer with a style of the following: Sour Ale, American Wild Ale, Lambic, Gose, Berliner Weisse, Flanders Red Ale, Flanders Oud Bruin, Gueuze or Faro.

items.badge_description: Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 5 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.
Looks like you're getting around. You've enjoyed at least 25 different beers!
items.badge_hint: Try lots of different brews!

items.badge_description: Instead of a spot of tea, why not enjoy a proper pint. That doesn’t mean you can't get all dressed up for it, so throw on your fanciest hat and enjoy that brew!
items.badge_hint: Try five (5) pints instead of tea between 4PM & 6PM within a calendar month in your local timezone.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 5 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Check into 5 different Pale Ales (Imperial Pales, American Pale Ales, New Zealand Pale Ale).

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 5 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 2.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.
items.badge_hint: Add a photo to your check-in 5 times. You must check-in to get this badge, adding a photo to an existing check-in counts, but you will need to check-in with a photo to unlock the badge.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery.

It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.
items.badge_hint: Try something new for 3 Thursdays in a 30 day period. You can only level up once per 30 days.

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.
Let's raise a toast to America's Independence Day, a holiday full of friends, food, and great beer. Happy 4th of July!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer from an American (United States) brewery between July 3rd - July 5th. Collaborations do not count, unless the primary brewey is from the US.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 10 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 3!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with a ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.

items.badge_hint: Check in to 5 different venues. This badge was turned into a level badge on 5/13/15. You will need to check-in to another beer at a venue to get your current level. As with all badges, this badge is retroactive to the date in which the badge was created (see the date above).

Does the word picking favorites mean anything to you? Obviously not. That's 10 different beers in a row.
items.badge_hint: Be spontaneous - try 10 different beers in a row.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 15 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 4!
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 times with the serving style of Draft.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 10 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Supporting local breweries is what helps the craft beer scene grow. You obviously know this since you’re enjoying the local flavor! Be sure to always drink locally.
items.badge_hint: Drink 5 different beers brewed by the same brewery within a 35-mile radius of your current location within the last 60 days.

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 15 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 4!
